items.title: Bending Spoons is buying AOL for some reason
items.summary: AOL will soon have a new owner. Bending Spoons, the Italian software company that has bought up a range of other digital businesses like Evernote, MeetUp, WeTransfer, and soon Vimeo, announced plans to purchase AOL from Yahoo after securing a $2.8 billion debt financing package. Over the past couple of decades, AOL has been passed […]

items.title: Meta Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results (Meta)
items.summary:
Meta:
Meta Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results  —  Meta Platforms, Inc. (Nasdaq: META) today reported financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025.  —  “We had a strong quarter for our business and our community,” said Mark Zuckerberg, Meta founder and CEO.

items.title: Two men sentenced to 25 years over Iran-backed plot to kill dissident
items.summary: (Reuters) -Two men convicted of murder-for-hire charges were each sentenced in New York on Wednesday to 25 years in prison over what prosecutors called a failed Tehran-backed plot to kill an Iranian dissident living in the U.S. Read full story

items.title: In rare move, top Republican lawmakers criticize US troop reduction in Romania
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -The top two Republican lawmakers who lead the Pentagon's oversight committees in the U.S. Congress issued a rare joint statement on Wednesday slamming the Trump's administration's decision to reduce the number of troops in Romania. Read full story

items.title: UK lawmakers question Prince Andrew's use of Windsor mansion
items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -A British parliamentary committee questioned on Wednesday whether Prince Andrew should still be living in a mansion on the Windsor Estate, west of London, in a rare political intervention sparked by the royal's ties to U.S. sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. Read full story

items.title: Tested: The Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max 240W ends my search for a powerful, reliable car charger [Deal]
items.summary:
It’s true that most modern cars come equipped with a couple of USB ports or even wireless charging pads, but nothing quite matches the convenience of a dedicated charger that plugs into the auxiliary port for fast, reliable power delivery. While Amazon is packed with car chargers of every kind, the Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max model, we’re checking out today, stands out from the crowd. This unit not only features multiple ports and connectors to charge up to four devices at once, but it also swivels and rotates for flexible positioning. That means you can easily adjust it to your seating setup for added convenience. I recently took it along on a road trip, and it’s quickly become my go-to car charger. Here’s a closer look at why I believe it’s such a dependable and well-designed pick.

more…

items.title: Let Yeedi’s S14 Plus or M12 Pro+ robots handle vacuuming and mopping at new and returning lows from $360 (Reg. $800+)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Yeedi is offering some serious savings on an array of robot vacuum/mops to upgrade your home cleaning routine. Among the lineup, which you can see in full here, we spotted the brand’s S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop down at $599.99 shipped. This model was released with a $1,400 price tag back in March, but has since come down to a starting $1,200 rate, with discounts having kept the price down at $700 since mid-August. Now, you can score it lower than ever – even beating Prime Day pricing – as it’s getting a 50% markdown to a new all-time low price. For folks not looking to spend so much, there’s also the M12 Pro+ robot back at its lowest $359.99 shipped pricing too. You can learn more about these two models that I highly recommend below, or check out our hands-on S14 Plus review, as well as our hands-on M12 Pro+ review.

more…

This Intel-powered notebook with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD typically goes for $950, so you’re looking at a $350 discount on it today. We’ve seen more variants of this laptop get a discount before, but this is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this entry-level 16 Plus model. Today’s deal marks a new best price to beat for this notebook, delivering some serious value today. For comparison, the same laptop with a non-touch display itself is currently going for $1,050 directly at Dell. Head below for more details.

items.title: Jamf says PE firm Francisco Partners agreed to take the device management software maker private in an all-cash deal valued at ~$2.2B, set to close in Q1 2026 (Connor Hart/Wall Street Journal)
items.summary:
Connor Hart / Wall Street Journal:
Jamf says PE firm Francisco Partners agreed to take the device management software maker private in an all-cash deal valued at ~$2.2B, set to close in Q1 2026  —  Jamf, which helps organizations manage and secure Apple products at work, said going private will provide greater financial flexibility

items.title: Serbia protests demand accountability one year after deadly roof collapse
items.summary: BELGRADE (Reuters) -Dijana Hrka, 48, whose son was among 16 people killed when the roof of a renovated railway station in Serbia collapsed, is angry with authorities for having held no one accountable a year later. Read full story

items.title: YouTube is using AI to upscale videos uploaded at between 240p and 720p to "HD" and plans to offer 4K upscaling "in the near future"; users can opt out (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)

YouTube is using AI to upscale videos uploaded at between 240p and 720p to “HD” and plans to offer 4K upscaling “in the near future”; users can opt out  —  ﻿The platform is optimizing its TV experience with new resolution upscaling and shopping features.
